participant_1.name: Rebecca
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and learning new things.
participant_1.background: i read twenty books a year. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household.

participant_2.name: Frank
participant_2.personality: friendly and outgoing, loves sharing stories and helping others.
participant_2.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: Well hello there! i like to read books. i read a lot.
